name: Swift Elf
description:
Swift Elf is a 2D platformer with adventure elements. In it you have to play as a clever elf who found himself in mysterious lands. Help him find a way out, destroy monsters and go through location after location collecting bonuses on his way!

In the game you have to go through more than 50 game levels, while you will die over and over again and despite your mistakes, you will have to go through the level on a new one!

Features of the game:
- Hardcore gameplay
- Nice soundtrack
- Many levels
